column5: Our prayers go out to your family.
We're all in this together with you Chris.
Positive vibes being sent...Stay strong Chris!
Jo and my thoughts and prayers are with you and your son at this time.
My thoughts and best wishes go out you and Chris,hang in there Buddie !
Prayers sent.
Hoping for all the best, he is in my thoughts and prayers.

At times like this I often think that there are things I should be saying or should be doing which would make things easier for you and Chris. If only I knew what they were!  You and Chris are always in our prayers!  Cliff & Sue.
My thoughts and prayers are with you too Chris,get well soon.  Hawg Hunter
Chris has never left our thoughts.........we will continue to pray.  Best regards, Sam, Laurie, Andrew & Hunter
Our thoughts and prayers are with you always Chris.  John and Barbara

Rob is one of the nicest people I have ever met! I feel just terrible about what Rob and his family are been going thru.  Our prayers are with you bud! If you need anything like I always tell you please feel free to call me!
Thoughts are with you and your family  RF
All the best (deep breath) Rob, Chris stay srong young man, we are all pulling for you.
Prayers and wishes sent.
Candle is lit...willing Chris to fight...strong healthy thoughts for you little man.

Dam...  I hate hearing about this dam desease....we can put a man on the moon, and even clone and entire creature from the makeings of one single cell, yet we still can't seem to stop one single cell from growing. Its incredibly frustrating to me, and it pains me to hear these things....especially when involves children. Many prayers sent.
My thoughts are with you Rob and Chris....  Believe..
Stay strong Chris & Rob - there's a huge amount of good karma being sent your way from everyone. Keep believing! My prayers are with you as well. DebS
Awww man... Chris stay strong little man..  I send some up for sure.  G
Our thoughts and prayers are with you. Take care guys.  This should never happen to children. Makes you wonder sometimes.
Carol and I will have Chris in our thoughts and prayers.... Chris,hang in there and be strong lil trooper

For all that know who Rob is and know what he has been going throught for years you know where this post is going for you who dont know this is our friend Rob his young son Chris has been very sick battleing cancer for way to many years over the weekend Chris became very sick again maybe with all our thoguhts we will help him get through again. I will not put to many details only that Chris and the family do need our help so please have him in your thoughts today and when you hug your family today remember how lucky we are and give a extra squeese for Chris.  We are still thinking of you Chris
My thoughts are with Rob, his son and their family.
Stay Strong Chris and Rob!
Thanks for posting that, Mike.
Will do Mike, thanks for the info.  My thoughts are with you and Chris at this time Rob.  I will be hoping for the best.  Because I do  Believe!!!  Joey
Chris has never left my thoughts...
Ditto. Odd though, something stirred in me the other night that made me feel as I should get in touch with Rob.
My thoughts are with you and your family too Rob...  I will be praying for the best..
My thoughts have been with Chris and his family everyday.  Dan
Hope all goes well, we're all here for you.
My thoughts and prayers have always been there for Chris.  This is truly sad news again. Thanks Mike for passing the information along.  John
Sad news for sure...  Another storm to weather but with our prayers and thoughts maybe all will be well again soon...
We'll be thinking of you (Rob, Chris and family) everyday!!
Thanks Mike.  Ill be thinking of them!
Thanks Mike, I heard from Rob yesterday, Diane and I are thinking of them.
Chris has been in my prayers every day and I too have been wondering and hoping.  The power of prayer is very powerful.  We're all here for you.
Chris has been a warrior.  We think of him every day.
My thoughts will be with Chris, I wish the best to him and a recovery, it's a terrible disease, my mom lost her battle on Sunday night.
oh i sure hope Chris will be ok!  My thoughts are with Chris, rob and there family for sure!
Best wishes for all of you.

My thoughts turn to him often, but after hearing about Jeff Healy and that dreadful 'C' word, I instantly thought of Chris again.  Our thoughts and prayers are with him and his family and friends once again...come on Chris...you can do it....just believe.
May you find the strenght to carry on during these most difficult of times.

My condolences Mark (Kulic), on your motherâ€™s passing. And thanks (Mr. Eh) for the posting. I often spend too much time crabbing to stop and be thankful for what I have. My son and I will mention Chris during prayers tonight. Best wishes to all. Jim
my thoughts and prayers are with you all
We'll say a couple of prayers tonight.
